H0.text: A freshwater lake in the mountains provides the best evidence that an environmental change has occurred.

H1.text: Marine fossils in a freshwater lake provide the best evidence that an environmental change has occurred.

H2.text: Saltwater clams in the ocean provide the best evidence that an environmental change has occurred.

H3.text: A sandy beach next to the ocean provides the best evidence that an environmental change has occurred.

A4.text: Sea level rise – Rise in sea levels due to climate change

A5.text: Marine band (geology) – Bed of rock containing marine fossils
